alert.note: Alert for Sheridan Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 4:16PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Sheridan County through 515 PM MDT... At 416 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Sheridan, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sheridan and Big Horn. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
